Sentencas: Supplying hydrogen for fuel cells safely and efficiently is the premise and guarantee of distributed power generation.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: A methanol steam reforming reformer was designed to supply fuel for kW-scale fuel cells.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: The reforming performance of reformer was evaluated through experiments.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: Based on the experimental results, a simulation model was established.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: The study found that the reforming performance of reformer is most affected by steam to carbon ratio (S/C) and heating temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: By increased the heating temperature, the methanol conversion can reach up to 99.64%.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: At high heating temperature, the local hotspot is appeared, leading to the methanation.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: The influence of back pressure on reforming performance is not significant.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: Increasing liquid hourly space velocity (LHSV) reduces methanol conversion.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: When the S/C is 1.2, the reforming performance is the greatest.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: Reforming gas can be directly used for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) after simple dehydration.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: When the LHSV is 1.2 h-1, it can supply fuel for 1 kW SOFC.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: Considering manufacturing cost and reforming performance, aluminum and S-shaped channel (>= 10 mm) are suitable for large-scale production of reformer.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: Power amplification of reformer is feasible.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell

Sentencas: Amplifying the reformer power to 50 kW and 100 kW, the methanol conversion of reformer can reach over 95%.
Titulo: Investigation of methanol steam reforming reformer heated by catalyst combustion for kW-scale fuel cell
